players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Wow, Diana's gone already. We need to be careful with our votes today. Alice and Charlie, any thoughts on who might be suspicious?"
Charlie: "Bob, I investigated Alice last night and discovered she's the mafioso. We need to vote her out today to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, that's a bold claim without any proof. Could it be you're trying to deflect attention from yourself? Bob, we need to think carefully, as false accusations can cost us the game."
Charlie: "Bob, the only way to prove my claim is through our votes. If Alice is not the mafioso, then you'll know I'm lying. But if she is, we'll save the town. Trust my investigation."
You: "Bob, it's possible Charlie is trying to manipulate you to gain advantage. Remember, false claims can be part of the mafia's strategy. We should consider all possibilities carefully."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, then voting out Alice will prove it. Alice, if you have any defense, now's the time to share it."
